item.title: Dow Futures Rise After Trump Strikes Trade Deal With EU: TSLA, LNG, LMT, ASML Among Stocks To Watch
item.description: While Dow Jones futures were up 0.16% at the time of writing, the S&P 500 futures surged 0.25%.

item.title: Apollo Microsystems’ Rises On Impressive Q1: SEBI RA Sees 20% Upside Potential
item.description: Profit after tax more than doubled to ₹19.43 crore, while revenue from operations surged 46% in Q1.

item.title: Nifty Breaches 24,700 On Kotak Bank, Real Estate Rout; SEBI RAs Flag Deeper Correction Risks
item.description: Analysts advise against fresh buying unless the index reclaims 24,800; support seen at 24,470–24,150.

item.title: Kotak Bank Cracks Key Support: SEBI RAs See Downside Amid Asset Quality Woes
item.description: A disappointing Q1 print and a 109% surge in provisions dragged Kotak Bank down sharply

item.title: AI Boom Or Bust? Alibaba Cloud’s Founder Says Most Of Today’s Apps Won’t Survive The Decade
item.description: Amid all the high-profile poaching going on in the AI industry, the scientist said talent isn’t a problem because the only thing you need to do is to ...
